jnxDCUs.name: jnxDCUs

revisions.description: Added jnxDcuStatsTable to expose per-address family stats. The current jnxDCUsTable will only apply to ipv4 stats.

jnxDCUs.contactinfo: Juniper Technical Assistance Center Juniper Networks, Inc. 1194 N. Mathilda Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 E-mail: support@juniper.net
jnxDCUs.description: This is Juniper Networks' implementation of enterprise specific MIB for Destination Class Usage (DCU)

jnxDCUSrcIfIndex.name: jnxDCUSrcIfIndex
jnxDCUSrcIfIndex.description: The source interface index. This is the ifIndex that the traffic is coming from and the statistics is counted for the specified DCU entry.

jnxDCUDstClassName.name: jnxDCUDstClassName
jnxDCUDstClassName.description: The name of the destination class. This is the name of a valid configuration group defining a set of IP addresses and/or prefixes.

jnxDCUPackets.name: jnxDCUPackets
jnxDCUPackets.description: The number of packets being counted pertaining to the specified DCU entry.

jnxDCUBytes.name: jnxDCUBytes
jnxDCUBytes.description: The number of bytes being counted pertaining to the specified DCU entry.

jnxDcuStatsTable.name: jnxDcuStatsTable
jnxDcuStatsTable.description: This table contains statistics for traffic that satisfies the rules in each configured Destination Class. A separate set of statistics are kept for each Destination Class on each interface and address family on which this feature is enabled.

jnxDcuStatsEntry.name: jnxDcuStatsEntry
jnxDcuStatsEntry.description: Each entry in this table contains a set of statistics for all traffic received on a specific interface and belonging to a specific address family that matches a specific Destination Class.

jnxDcuStatsSrcIfIndex.name: jnxDcuStatsSrcIfIndex
jnxDcuStatsSrcIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the ingress interface for traffic counted in this entry.

jnxDcuStatsAddrFamily.name: jnxDcuStatsAddrFamily
jnxDcuStatsAddrFamily.description: The address family of this entry's traffic.

jnxDcuStatsClassName.name: jnxDcuStatsClassName
jnxDcuStatsClassName.description: The name of the destination class.

jnxDcuStatsPackets.name: jnxDcuStatsPackets
jnxDcuStatsPackets.description: The number of packets received on this interface, belonging to this address family that match this Destination Class.

jnxDcuStatsBytes.name: jnxDcuStatsBytes
jnxDcuStatsBytes.description: The number of bytes received on this interface, belonging to this address family that match this Destination Class.

jnxDcuStatsClName.name: jnxDcuStatsClName
jnxDcuStatsClName.description: The name of the destination class. This object is a duplicate of jnxDcuStatsClassName and is included to satisfy those NM applications that can't extract the name from the instance portion of the OID.
